summary: In Mussolini's Rome a murderer is targeting young girls. The movie explores how the fascist mind works, how it plays its values off the sentiment of the masses and explores the role of the press in creating a unified narrative.
cast: Nino Manfredi|Guido Leontini|Orso Maria Guerrini|Gabriele Lavia|Anna Maria Pescatori|Luciano Catenacci|Mario Carotenuto|Carlo Alighiero|Fortunato Arena|Silvio Bagolini|Luigi Casellato|Angela Covello|Laura De Marchi|Arturo Dominici|Vittorio Duse|Ubaldo Granata|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Lisa Leonardi|Eleonora Morana|Gianna Morelli|Piero Morgia|Gianni Musy|Claudio Nicastro|Stefano Oppedisano|Umberto Raho|Mel√π Valente|Giuseppe Vicini|Renata Zamengo|Elio Zamuto|Aristide Caporale|Nestore Cavaricci|Fulvio Mingozzi|Nello Pazzafini|Franca Scagnetti|Luca Sportelli|Alessandro Tedeschi|Lara Wendel
title: Girolimoni, il mostro di Roma
